TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A genetic condition characterized by short stature, premature aging, sensitivity to light, and possibly deafness and mental retardation.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "síndrome de Cockayne"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Afección genética caracterizada por estatura baja, envejecimiento prematuro, sensibilidad a la luz y, posiblemente, sordera y retraso mental.
